name: little-realm
description:
Little Realm Website

This is a design for my online shop and a place where I can practice my website development. It's still in construction as I gather all my resources and advance into understanding the enviroment and the languages.

Funcionalities

The functionalities I'm aiming for are:
  • Responsive website
  • Database access
  • User sign-up
  • Profile data
author: Moonstres
